targets.query:
-- time = 0,  Total, level 3+
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "Total" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group"::integer >= 3 AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/ AND "group3"=~/^$group3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"

-- time = 0,  Total, level 2
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "Total" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='2' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2"

-- time = 0,  Total, level 1
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "Total" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='1' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1") GROUP BY "request", "group1"

-- time = 0,  Total, level 0
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "Total" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/ OR "request" = 'allRequests') AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request") GROUP BY "request"

-- time = 0,  OK, level 3+
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "OK" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group"::integer >= 3 AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/ AND "group3"=~/^$group3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"

-- time = 0,  OK, level 2
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "OK" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='2' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2"

-- time = 0,  OK, level 1
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "OK" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='1' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1") GROUP BY "request", "group1"

-- time = 0,  OK, level 0
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "OK" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/ OR "request" = 'allRequests') AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request") GROUP BY "request"

-- time = 0,  KO, level 3+
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "KO" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group"::integer >= 3 AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/ AND "group3"=~/^$group3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"

-- time = 0,  KO, %KO, level 2
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "KO", last("T")/$Total as "% KO" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='2' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2") GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2"

-- time = 0,  KO, %KO, level 1
SELECT (first("T") + last("T") - first("T")) as "KO", last("T")/$Total as "% KO" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "T" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='1' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1") GROUP BY "request", "group1"

-- time = 0,  "KO", "% KO", level 0
SELECT (first("X") + last("X") - first("X")) as "KO", last("X")/$Total as "% KO" FROM (SELECT sum("count") as "X" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/ OR "request" = 'allRequests') AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request") GROUP BY "request"

-- time = 0,  min, 50%, 75%, 95%, max, mean, std, level 3+
SELECT
  (first("Min")+last("Min")-first("Min")) as "Min",
  (first("50th pct")+last("50th pct")-first("50th pct")) as "50th pct",
  (first("75th pct")+last("75th pct")-first("75th pct")) as "75th pct",
  (first("95th pct")+last("95th pct")-first("95th pct")) as "95th pct",
  (first("99th pct")+last("99th pct")-first("99th pct")) as "99th pct",
  (first("Max")+last("Max")-first("Max")) as "Max",
  (first("Mean")+last("Mean")-first("Mean")) as "Mean",
  (first("Std dev")+last("Std dev")-first("Std dev")) as "Std dev"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    min("min") as "Min",
    percentile("percentiles50", 50) as "50th pct",
    percentile("percentiles75", 75) as "75th pct",
    percentile("percentiles95", 95) as "95th pct",
    percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct",
    max("max") as "Max",
    mean("mean") as "Mean",
    percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
  FROM 
    "$archive"."gatling" 
  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group"::integer >= 3 AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/ AND "group3"=~/^$group3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"
) GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"

-- time = 0,  min, 50%, 75%, 95%, max, mean, std, level 2
SELECT
  (first("Min")+last("Min")-first("Min")) as "Min",
  (first("50th pct")+last("50th pct")-first("50th pct")) as "50th pct",
  (first("75th pct")+last("75th pct")-first("75th pct")) as "75th pct",
  (first("95th pct")+last("95th pct")-first("95th pct")) as "95th pct",
  (first("99th pct")+last("99th pct")-first("99th pct")) as "99th pct",
  (first("Max")+last("Max")-first("Max")) as "Max",
  (first("Mean")+last("Mean")-first("Mean")) as "Mean",
  (first("Std dev")+last("Std dev")-first("Std dev")) as "Std dev"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    min("min") as "Min",
    percentile("percentiles50", 50) as "50th pct",
    percentile("percentiles75", 75) as "75th pct",
    percentile("percentiles95", 95) as "95th pct",
    percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct",
    max("max") as "Max",
    mean("mean") as "Mean",
    percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
  FROM 
    "$archive"."gatling" 
  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='2' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2"
) GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2"

-- time = 0, min, 50%, 75%, 95%, max, mean, std, level 1
SELECT 
  (first("Min")+last("Min")-first("Min")) as "Min",
  (first("50th pct")+last("50th pct")-first("50th pct")) as "50th pct",
  (first("75th pct")+last("75th pct")-first("75th pct")) as "75th pct",
  (first("95th pct")+last("95th pct")-first("95th pct")) as "95th pct",
  (first("99th pct")+last("99th pct")-first("99th pct")) as "99th pct",
  (first("Max")+last("Max")-first("Max")) as "Max",
  (first("Mean")+last("Mean")-first("Mean")) as "Mean",
  (first("Std dev")+last("Std dev")-first("Std dev")) as "Std dev"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    min("min") as "Min",
    percentile("percentiles50", 50) as "50th pct",
    percentile("percentiles75", 75) as "75th pct",
    percentile("percentiles95", 95) as "95th pct",
    percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct",
    max("max") as "Max",
    mean("mean") as "Mean",
    percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
  FROM 
    "$archive"."gatling" 
  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND (("group"='1' AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/)) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1"
) GROUP BY "request", "group1"

-- time = 0,  min, 50%, 75%, 95%, max, mean, std, level 0
SELECT 
  (first("Min")+last("Min")-first("Min")) as "Min",
  (first("50th pct")+last("50th pct")-first("50th pct")) as "50th pct",
  (first("75th pct")+last("75th pct")-first("75th pct")) as "75th pct",
  (first("95th pct")+last("95th pct")-first("95th pct")) as "95th pct",
  (first("99th pct")+last("99th pct")-first("99th pct")) as "99th pct",
  (first("Max")+last("Max")-first("Max")) as "Max",
  (first("Mean")+last("Mean")-first("Mean")) as "Mean",
  (first("Std dev")+last("Std dev")-first("Std dev")) as "Std dev"
FROM (
  SELECT 
    min("min") as "Min",
    percentile("percentiles50", 50) as "50th pct",
    percentile("percentiles75", 75) as "75th pct",
    percentile("percentiles95", 95) as "95th pct",
    percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct",
    max("max") as "Max",
    mean("mean") as "Mean",
    percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
  FROM 
    "$archive"."gatling" 
  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/ OR "request" = 'allRequests') AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"
) GROUP BY "request"

targets.query: SELECT "active"-"done" FROM (SELECT mean("active") AS "active", non_negative_derivative(last("done"), 1s) AS "done" FROM "$archive"."gatling.users" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "request" = 'allUsers' AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g) fill(null))

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("active")), 1s) AS "Active Users" FROM "$archive"."gatling.users" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "request" = 'allUsers' AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g) fill(null)

SELECT 
  last("Min")+first("Min")-last("Min") as "Min",
  last("50th pct")+first("50th pct")-last("50th pct") as "50th pct",
  last("75th pct")+first("75th pct")-last("75th pct") as "75th pct",
  last("95th pct")+first("95th pct")-last("95th pct") as "95th pct",
  last("99th pct")+first("99th pct")-last("99th pct") as "99th pct",
  last("Max")+first("Max")-last("Max") as "Max",
  last("Mean")+first("Mean")-last("Mean") as "Mean",
  last("Std dev")+first("Std dev")-last("Std dev") as "Std dev"
FROM (
SELECT min("min") as "Min", percentile("percentiles50", 50) as "50th pct", percentile("percentiles75", 75) as "75th pct", percentile("percentiles95", 95) as "95th pct", percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct", max("max") as "Max", ceil(mean("mean")) as "Mean", percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
FROM "$archive"."gatling"
WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/ AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '' OR ("group" = '1' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/) OR ("group" = '2' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/ AND "group2" =~ /^$group2$/) OR ("group"!='' AND "group"!='1' AND "group"!='2' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/ AND "group2" =~ /^$group2$/ AND "group3" =~ /^$group3$/)) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "status" fill(null)
), 
(SELECT "X" as "Min", "X" as "50th pct", "X" as "75th pct", "X" as "95th pct", "X" as "99th pct", "X" as "Max", "X" as "Mean", "X" as "Std dev"
FROM ( 
SELECT last("count")-last("count")-10 as "X" FROM "$archive"."gatling" GROUP BY "status"
) GROUP BY "status"
)
GROUP BY "status"

SELECT
  (first("Min")+last("Min")-first("Min")) as "Min",
  (first("50th pct")+last("50th pct")-first("50th pct")) as "50th pct",
  (first("75th pct")+last("75th pct")-first("75th pct")) as "75th pct",
  (first("95th pct")+last("95th pct")-first("95th pct")) as "95th pct",

  (first("Std dev")+last("Std dev")-first("Std dev")) as "Std dev"

  FROM

  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" =~ /^$request$/) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group"::integer >= 4 AND "group1"=~/^$group1$/ AND "group2"=~/^$group2$/ AND "group3"=~/^$group3$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request", "group1", "group2", "group3"

    percentile("percentiles99", 99) as "99th pct",
    max("max") as "Max",
    mean("mean") as "Mean",
    percentile("stdDev", 95) as "Std dev"
  FROM 
    "gatling" 
  WHERE 
    ("status" = 'all') AND ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND ("request" = 'allRequests') AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '') AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"
) GROUP BY "request"

panels.content: > $request : Response Time

targets.query: SELECT min("min") AS "min", percentile("percentiles50", 50) AS "50%", percentile("percentiles75", 75) AS "75%", percentile("percentiles95", 95) AS "95%", percentile("percentiles99", 99) AS "99%", max("max") AS "max"  FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/ AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND ("group" = '0' OR "group" = '' OR ("group" = '1' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/) OR ("group" = '2' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/ AND "group2" =~ /^$group2$/) OR ("group"!='' AND "group"!='1' AND "group"!='2' AND "group1" =~ /^$group1$/ AND "group2" =~ /^$group2$/ AND "group3" =~ /^$group3$/)) AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g), "simulation" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("active")), 1s) AS "Active Users" FROM "$archive"."gatling.users" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "request" = 'allUsers' AND ("run" =~ /^$run$/ OR "run" = '') AND ("host" =~ /^$host$/ OR "host" = '')) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($g), "simulation" fill(null)
